text: State Minister of Defence Hon. Ruwan Wijewardene visited the Australian Offshore Patrol Vessel 'Ocean Shield' at the Trincomalee harbor (16th Tuesday, May 2017).Australian Offshore Patrol Vessel, 'Ocean Shield' arrived to the island for a two day visit yesterday (16th May) and was welcomed by the Sri Lanka Navy in compliance with naval traditions.High Commissioner of Australia to Sri Lanka HE Bryce Hutchesson, State Officials, senior naval officers and ship's crew were present at the occasion.
title: State Minister visits Australian Offshore Patrol Vessel 'Ocean Shield'
